excerpt: "Driving the news: IBM is exploring a sale of the unit, including weather.com, in a deal that could fetch more than $1 billion, the Wall Street Journal reports. Why it matters: The move is part of IBM's push to streamline its operations to focus more on growing its cloud services and artificial intelligence businesses."
